ca.ualberta.cs.lonelytwitter

Class LonelyTwitterActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.lonelytwitter.LonelyTwitterActivity
  • Deprecated.

    public class LonelyTwitterActivity
extends Activity
    The main activity for a small Twitter app to capture,
    notes and comments.

    It saves the input tweets in the form of json files.


    A sample code is as:
    for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++){ for (j = 0; j < i; j++){ doSomething(); } }
    The list of important activities in this calss are as follows:
    • item 1
    • item 2
    • item 3
    • item 4
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Ali
    See Also:
    NormalTweet, java.awt
